channel.title: I just dont understand project dungeonfest!
channel.description:
omg plz some1 help me!! i need a client that can work with pdf source. and i have also tried to solve the cache problem. so i changed the cache and used one that i had .LummyScape. anyways now i get this problem
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/rs2hd/Mai n : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.rs2hd.Main. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
plz help me i dont know what to do.
well damn! now i edited the run.bat for source and changed the jre6 to jre7 and now i get this... plz help
[2013/05/27 22:22:23] [Project DungeonFest]: Project DungeonFest framework [2013/05/27 22:22:23] [Project DungeonFest]: Loaded 15558item prices. no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2013/05/27 22:22:28] [Project DungeonFest]: now what do i do? help plz i need to get this fix...

item.title: I just dont understand project dungeonfest!
item.dc:creator: @alicaytheseventh alicaytheseventh
item.description:
@alicaytheseventh wrote:

well the compiler actually works fine. but i have updated and use jdk1.7.0_21 and the first error is no longer happening and now i get that second error

Read full topic
item.source: I just dont understand project dungeonfest!

item.title: I just dont understand project dungeonfest!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The first error is because you’re compiling/running with a lower java version then you need.

Read full topic
item.source: I just dont understand project dungeonfest!
